name: The Profane WYRD - Ashcan Edition
description:
When I first read Disaster Tourism's WYRD, I saw an excellent foundation that could be built upon and an infinite number of hacks and mods that could be slapped on to it without the game buckling.

The Profane WYRD is my take on adding a hefty dose of B/X style gameplay while maintaining the original design philosophy of ultra-lite. Inside you will find:

  • Optional rules for a more crunchier B/X style game
  • 15 no prep adventure seeds
  • D66 list of truly bizarre and just plain ol' weird items for your party to wield

_________

NOTE: This Ashcan Edition is provided to you PWYW (pay what  you want). If you enjoyed it consider donating! All donations received will be used to fund further projects here at CSG including the expanded and complete print + PDF of "The Profane WYRD"
